name: üçú #003 ‚Äî Product Hunt thumbs
description:
Got a PH launch coming up?


Use this mockup to preview how your product thumb will look on Product Hunt's homepage. Make sure you stand out ‚Äî and don't forget to check PH's own guidelines:


It is best to use an image with square dimensions. We recommend 240x240. You can use a GIF for your thumbnail, but it will need to be under 3MB and not too 'flashy'. GIFs will only animate while hovering over a post. GIFs with strobing effects, quick cuts, unreadable text, etc. are not recommended and may be edited by the Product Hunt team.


Good luck with your launch! If you need help with the file, ask me on Discord or Twitter:


discord.gg/cWrqHDUqMU

twitter.com/antimofm
